statement.p: Bria loves gummy worms so much that after returning from Top Foods with some gummy worms, she eats 35 of the gummy worms she just bought. The next day she eats 35 of the remaining gummy worms and continues to eat another 35 each day. What percent of the gummy worms will Bria have left after eight days? (Round your answer to the nearest whole percent.)
